pageContext.claim: “Biden was constantly … vacationing, relaxing & making shady deals with other countries, & that Barack was always playing golf, doing much of his traveling in a fume spewing 747 to play golf in Hawaii - Once even teeing off immediately after announcing the gruesome death of a great young man by ISIS!”
pageContext.analysis: Let he who is without 747 vacation mileage cast the first stone. Alas,Trump does not have much of a leg to stand on here. He had made 30 visits to Palm Beach (total air travel 51,540 miles) on Air Force One. At the comparable point in his presidency, Obama had made three vacation trips to Hawaii (total air travel 28,978 miles), according to CBS News's Mark Knoller.
